Reviews.Title: “trip to amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: kerstin b Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: service people friendly helpful location hotel excellent nearly 10 minutes feet city ok bathroom dont own toilette ok 4 days stayed hotel hotel stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Its ok, but not worth the money.”
Reviews.Author: 117hdesai
Reviews.Content: 3 nights hotel shabby bb walk steep staircase level top floor shower toilet shared balcony nicest otherwise bed terrible colour smell walked breakfast time nightmare 1st morning pushed till 9am 2nd morning told late breakfast refused sat pieces bread jams breakfast service 3rd morning greeted enjoyed breakfast staff run hotel friends family ok insist pay leave guy nice helpful breakfast guy terrible probably stay shame location thats looking

Reviews.Title: “The worst place in Amsterdam I have stayed in, but not catastrophic”
Reviews.Author: hawkinspete
Reviews.Content: booked hotel reading negative reviews basis cheapest expedia time crash looked cleaner expecting noticable stains carpet walls bedding towels looked ok luxurious lacked hotel basics tv infamous stairs daunting sight travellers luggage 80 yearolds staying time managed top floor ok stairs look worse noisy sounds guests disturbing church bells ring 30 minutes 24x7 bring earplugs youll ok didnt looks clean woke scratching left multiple insect bites bed bugs guess staff friendly shared toilet bathroom clean shower door lock location excellent dam square pleasant experience catastrophic fine crash nights expectations set low advance

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable and you're guaranteed a good nights sleep after you've climbed the stairs!”
Reviews.Author: Jonny_L_Burnside
Reviews.Content: 6 stayed 3 nights stag party friend booked deal hotel didnt cost earth found hotel slightly basic clean comfortable beds fine plenty running hot water showers basically looking base crash night 2 breakfast days understand wasnt bread jam excellent saras pancake house door jennifers road didnt starve location hotel ideal 10 minutes walk dam square 2 mins anne frank museum canal cruise stops hotel busy thoroughfare warm kept window night woken trams start 5 am church bells half hour top floor reviewers stairs nightmare 1st staircase greets front door takes reception imposing site stay wouldnt necessarily wife romantic break parties looking base explore city reasonable cost ideal

Reviews.Title: “Avoid like the plague”
Reviews.Author: ShaneL79
Reviews.Content: october booked nights soon arrived looked dingy lobby absolutely disgusted feces stains floor blood stains dozen stains dont stains looked unwashed double bed mentioned hotelsca actually cots half springs completely missing broken thin mattress touching floor dirty sheets dirty holes tried save bucks trip slept park bench rain stay reception refund refused speak manager owner refused discovered guy refusing owner manager eventually piles emails calls hotelsca refund nights hotels description accurate send pictures found nice hotel price nice residential neighbourhood near leidseplein unless extremely strict budget absolutely standards sleep avoid costs

Reviews.Title: “More like hostel than hotel”
Reviews.Author: citybike
Reviews.Content: described web stayed single clean bit worn bed linen breakfast bread marmalades toaster location renovation actually painting refurnishing officially star european standard low standard hotel lovely hostel ensuites service ok price key factor stairs own atmosphere

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Galerij
HotelInfo.Address: Raadhuisstraat 43, Amsterdam 1016 DD, The Netherlands
